comment.text: The "ResetApplicationTitle" translation key is used to display a title for a dialog that resets an application's configuration. This title is displayed in a ModalDialog Header and appears when the user interacts with a button labeled "ResetApplicationTitle".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Resetear ajustes de aplicación" is understandable, "Reset application configuration" implies a more complete reset than simply adjusting settings. A more accurate translation might convey the full scope of the reset.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Restablecer configuración de la aplicación" or "Reiniciar configuración de la aplicación" for a more precise translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Nollaa' is a valid translation for 'Reset', 'kokoonpano' translates more accurately to 'configuration' or 'settings' rather than 'structure'. 'Nollaa sovelluksen asetukset' or 'Nollaa sovelluksen määritykset' would be more accurate.
The translation '애플리케이션 구성 리셋' is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Korean. A more natural phrasing would be '애플리케이션 설정 초기화' or '애플리케이션 구성 초기화'.

The Lao translation "ການຕັ້ງຂໍ້ມູນຄືນໃຫມ່" is a literal translation of 'reset data'. While understandable, a more accurate and natural translation of 'Reset application configuration' would convey the meaning of restoring the application to a default or initial state. It's more than just resetting data.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "ການຣີເຊັດການຕັ້ງຄ່າແອັບພິເຄຊັນ" (Kan re-set gan tang kha aepphikechan) - which translates to 'Reset application settings' or "ການຕັ້ງຄ່າແອັບພິເຄຊັນຄືນໃຫມ່" (Kan tang kha aepphikechan khuen mai) - which translates to 'Reset application configuration'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Reset toepassing configuratie' is too literal. A more natural Dutch phrasing for 'Reset application configuration' would be 'Configuratie terugzetten' or 'Toepassing configureren terugzetten'. 'Configuratie terugzetten' is a standard phrase used in this context.
The translation 'Resetarea aplicației' is not a complete or accurate translation of 'Reset application configuration'. It translates to 'Application reset' which lacks the 'configuration' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Resetează configurația aplicației' or 'Resetarea configurației aplicației' for a more accurate translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'යෙදුමේ වින්‍යාසය යළි සකසන්න' while understandable, is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Reset application configuration'. 'Configuration' implies settings, and 'යෙදුමේ වින්‍යාසය' is a bit literal. A more common phrasing would convey the action of reverting to default settings.

The Serbian translation "Ресетуј конфигурацију апликације" is a literal transliteration of 'Reset application configuration.' While understandable, a more natural Serbian phrasing would be better. The word 'reset' is often borrowed directly, but in this context, a more idiomatic translation might improve readability and flow.

The translation "Đặt lại cấu hình ứng dụng" while understandable, is a more literal translation of 'reset'. A more natural and idiomatic translation for 'Reset application configuration' would be something like 'Khôi phục cài đặt ứng dụng' or 'Thiết lập lại cấu hình ứng dụng'. 'Đặt lại' can sometimes imply a manual setting, whereas 'reset' often means reverting to factory defaults.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Khôi phục cài đặt ứng dụng
